snippet.title: Best Ludum Dare 41 Games #3: Check Please, Heat of Battle, Torn, You Left Me, If Potato Meets Flag
snippet.description:
More of the best Ludum Dare 41 games! With Check Please, The Heat of Battle, Torn, You Left Me & If Potato Meets Flag Then, all combining 2 incompatible genres.
► Subscribe to Randomise User: http://bit.ly/RandomiseUser
► Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser

In this video looking at some of the best Ludum Dare 41 games, we Check Please (dating sim & surgeon sim), The Heat of Battle (mixing up cute and violent games), Torn (walking sim & rhythm game), You left Me (adventure game about loneliness and loss) and If Potato Meets Flag Then (programming meets platform game).

Watch full LD41 playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1fmv8R6tX3cnje0oS8o2Hpw8

Ludum Dare 41 took place over one weekend in April 2018, with entrants creating a game in 48 hours (for the compo) or 72 hours (for the jam). All games were on the theme of "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

Download & play these best Ludum Dare 41 games:

Check Please: https://swav-gav.itch.io/check-please?ac=jXdAbFQF
Heat of Battle: https://stairfallinstitute.itch.io/the-heat-of-battle?ac=jXdAbFQF
Torn: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/torn-1
You Left Me: https://zephyo.itch.io/you-left-me?ac=jXdAbFQF
If Potato Meets Flag Then: https://joqlepecheur.itch.io/ifpotatomeetsflagthen?ac=jXdAbFQF

All Ludum Dare 41 games: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/games/

Itch.io links include an affiliate code and purchases made through it may help support Randomise User in future.
